name: 18th International Conference on Frontiers in Alternative & Traditional Medicine
content: 18th International Conference on Frontiers in Alternative & Traditional Medicine, will be organized around the theme “Theme: Role of Alternative Medicine against SARS-CoV-2 ” Alternative Medicine 2023 is comprised of keynote and speakers sessions on latest cutting edge research designed to offer comprehensive global discussions that address current issues in Alternative Medicine 2023 Submit your abstract to any of the mentioned tracks. Register now for the conference by choosing an appropriate package suitable to you.
